Title: Modelworker women's screen (three)
Publisher: Huanqiu heji shupian chubanshe (环球和技术篇出版社), Shanghai
Notes: Luo Shufang (骆淑芳), model factory worker.This poster is part of a series of four. Only two are in the IISH collection; the other one features Liang Jun, one of China's first female tractor drivers.
